name: QuickSpanish
0:
”Alexa, open Quick Spanish”
”Alexa, start Quick Spanish”
”Alexa, run Quick Spanish”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: quick spanish
des: Want to practice your Spanish? Need a quick translation? This skill is simple, fast and can translate entire phrases! Just open the skill by saying "Alexa, Open Quick Spanish." Speak a word or phrase in English, and Alexa will say it back to you in Spanish. It's easy! Translated by Google.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
